![Psychedelicraft](https://github.com/TheRealSpriteMan1337/Psychedelicraft/blob/1.12.2-STABLE/src/main/resources/gfx/psychedelicraft/logo.png)
============

**The One and Only. Accept no substitutes!**

![Github Wiki](https://img.shields.io/badge/Wiki-white?logo=github&logoColor=gray&link=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2FTheRealSpriteMan1337%2FPsychedelicraft%2Fwiki) ![Minecraft Forum](https://img.shields.io/badge/Minecraft_Forum-blue?logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,&logoSize=auto&labelColor=3C9E3C&link=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.minecraftforum.net%2Ftopic%2F563257-172-ivorius-mods-drugs-statues-flags-boxes-of-doom-hamsters%2F) ![Discord Server](https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-5865F2?logo=discord&logoColor=white&link=https%3A%2F%2Fdiscord.gg%2FgddfFxqXbH)

------------


*Ever wanted to get Steve or Alex high? Blackout drunk? Stoned? Perhaps even tripping on 'shrooms? No? Well, with this mod,* <i><ins>NOW YOU CAN!</ins></i>

Regardless â€” this mod lets you do so. With shaders, it accomplishes a party of colors on your screen like no other. It doesn't dissappoint.

Now on Minecraft 1.12.2, it can be paired with many other popular mods.

------------

Licensing
============
**Licenses all projects that make this possible can be found [here](https://github.com/TheRealSpriteMan1337/Psychedelicraft/blob/1.12.2-STABLE/CREDITS).**
**Likewise, the license to Ivorius' Psychedelicraft can be found [here](https://github.com/TheRealSpriteMan1337/Psychedelicraft/blob/1.12.2-STABLE/LICENSE).**

This mod is licensed under the MIT License. As stipulated by them, you must include a link to this page and mention the creator/maintainer's (in this case, Ivorius') name.

You are allowed to use this mod in modpacks.

Contributing
============

Requires: [Gradle 8.7](https://gradle.org) and [Java 17+](https://www.azul.com/downloads/?package=jdk#zulu).
1. **Fork this mod.**
2. Clone your fork locally. Don't do this by downloading the `.zip`.
3. Open a `cmd.exe` window where the repository was cloned. Run the following:
```
> gradlew setupDecompWorkspace
> gradlew build
> gradlew runClient
```
**And you're done!**

This mod is written with [Minecraft Forge 14.23.5.2847](https://files.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/index_1.12.2.html). Visit [its repo](https://github.com/MinecraftForge/MinecraftForge/tree/1.12.x) for detailed setup instructions.
